definition: a step up/to rise to the next level
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: If excellent work results in frequent pay increases or promotions.
sentences.chinese: 如果工作出色能經常得到加薪提級。

sentences.english: I believe accelerated promotion is justified and I should have it now.
sentences.chinese: 我相信提前晉升是有根據的，現在就給我提級。
